cause.description:
Animal cruelty is wrong and it needs to stop all over the world...join this cause if you believe this as many others do. Donate money to a great cause or help to raise money or...just invite someone you know to join this cause.
1. Animal cruelty is wrong
2. Animals cruelty has to stop
3. We will help put an end to animal cruelty around the world
cause.mission: Help beat animal cruelty in the world
cause.name: Save Animals From Cruelty
